review.title: Beautiful suites, friendly staff, great location
review.reviewText: We thoroughly enjoyed our time at Casa San Francisco. The staff was friendly and helpful, most spoke English fluently. Rooms are clean and spacious, and the entire hotel is beautiful-- especially the view from the rooftop terrace. The restaurant was great for a drink or appetizer,  and the included breakfast has many delicious choices. The only thing that could be improved during our stay was at night-- the music from the restaurant and bar was somewhat loud (for reference, we stayed on the bottom floor close to the bar) and there weren't curtains to block out sunlight.
review.positiveRemarks: Friendly and knowledgeable staff, clean rooms, beautiful courtyard and rooftop terrace, great breakfast
review.negativeRemarks: Curtains for the rooms downstairs, warning guests ahead of time of the noise (so that guests who want to go to bed early can sleep upstairs)
review.locationRemarks: Great location- walking distance to Central Park, Cathedrals, Calle Calzada, many great restaurants

review.title: A beautiful hotel and great home base for Granada
review.reviewText: Casa San Francisco is a beautiful oasis on a quiet but central street in Granada. We were a group of four friends who shared two rooms for three nights. We were very happy with the rooms, as well as the service we received from the hotel staff and bar. Our server Graciella at breakfast was lovely (and the food and coffee is delicious!) and we were also treated very well by Winston and Kevin at the bar and by the front desk staff. I would heartily recommend this hotel to friends and family and hope to return soon!

review.title: Awesome quaint hotel
review.reviewText:
My son and I wanted to stay in a nice hotel in downtown Granada. 

We are not fans of larger hotels. 

The Hotel Casa San Francisco fit the bill. 

We had a wonderful stay. The rooms were nice size and very comfortable  

The rate included breakfast as well which was definetly a plus. 

When we were there the owner took us on a walk through of the new rooms they had just completed. 

It was amazing to me how well the completed the improvements. 

they blend in perfectly with the rest of the hotel. 

the dip pool is a plus as well. 

we will definetly return.

review.title: Best service I have EVER experienced!
review.reviewText: The service and accommodations of this hotel is fantastic. My family was traveling in Nicaragua for a week and this was the last portion of our trip, we had a 12:45 am flight the following day.  Everyone had a bad case of stomach flu....especially my 5 year old daughter.  Rather than charging us for 2 nights the hotel aloud us to remain in the room free of charge till our transportation to the airport arrived.  I have never experienced such amazing service in my life.  Do not hesitate to stay at the Casa San Francisco.
review.positiveRemarks: The service is the best I have ever experienced.
review.locationRemarks: The plaza, the garden cafe and the steak house are all within walking distance.

review.title: This hotel is a gem in Granada
review.reviewText: I've stayed in many Granada hotels and this is the best by far. Will stay again!

photos.caption: Our bedroom with our own private terrace

review.title: Boutique hotel within walking distance to sites.
review.reviewText: Lovely hotel with 9 unique rooms with Nicaraguan flair decor (we were in unit 1 which was probably their best room). Friendly and helpful staff were delightful. Hearty breakfast was included with your stay. Hotel is currently expanding so it was a bit noisy during the day. Cool showers only as there is no hot water however it was not an issue at this time of the year due to the heat (early May). We will definitely come back here to try the new rooms!

review.title: Lovely in every way
review.reviewText: Lovely hotel in every way. Can't fault it except that we have had bigger rooms for the same price elsewhere

review.title: Great place
review.reviewText: Recommend highly!    Loved Granada and the hotel !

review.title: Great place to stay to relax and tour
review.reviewText: This is our 2nd stay at the hotel and will stay again. It is just the right size and has all the comforts to relax and enjoy! It is within walking distance of the plaza and restaurant row. Granada has an ample selection of different types of tours. Prices of tours, food and drinks are very reasonable. The hotel has a nice bar that offers happy hour prices for drinks and appetizers. The menu is limited to chef specials that are excellent. As to the staff, after a day with them, your experience is one of being among friends.
review.positiveRemarks: A converted mansion that has only nine rooms two floors. Each room is tastefully decorated. Garden for dinning, relaxing and pool. Scenic roof terrace
review.negativeRemarks: What can be improved is being improved. The hotel is adding more rooms by expanding into the building next door.
review.locationRemarks: Mostly everything is within walking distance from the hotel. As for tours, the hotel can make arrangements to have you picked up at the hotel.

review.title: Nice hotel in a great location
review.reviewText: We were very impressed with our stay at Casa San Francisco. It was in a very central location, within walking distance to many restaurants, shops, and the park. The room was clean and comfortable, and the pool/courtyard areas were beautiful. The pool was small, but nice to cool off in during the heat of the day. The staff was very friendly as well, and helped us to arrange a shuttle to the airport. We will definitely stay here again next time we're in Granada!
